Package Bank

Class Account

java.lang.Object
Bank.Account
public class Account extends Object
Represents a bank account with features like deposit, withdraw, and transaction history.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Account(Customer Owner, AccountType type)
    Constructs an Account with a specified owner and type.

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(Customer Owner, AccountType type)
      Constructs an Account with a specified owner and type. Initializes balance to 0 and increments account number counter.
      Parameters:
      Owner - The customer who owns this account.
      type - The type of this account.

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit(double deposit)
      Attempts to deposit a specified amount to the account. Adds a transaction log if successful.
      Parameters:
      deposit - The amount to deposit.
      Returns:
      true if deposit was successful, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(double withdrawAmount)
      Attempts to withdraw a specified amount from the account. Adds a transaction log if successful.
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - The amount to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • getTransactionHistory

      public List<TransactionLog> getTransactionHistory()
      Returns the transaction history of this account.
      Returns:
